one_reviews_text: This app is a lot better than the name implies! bravo!

As other reviewers have mentioned, if you like brawlers like Double Dragon then this a modern take on the brawler.  I say modern because there's more combos, unlocks, special moves, item pickups, etc.  Also the boss fights are interesting.  There's a lot of enemy variety and also interesting locations.  The reason I only give it 3 stars is because I don't think VR gives any special immersion to this gametype.  Honestly, this game is probably more fun on a flat screen or at least it's easier to play that way.  And yeah, if you have friends as well it's probably more fun.
Great game overall, good art design (excellent  humour), solid gameplay with a fantastic sound track. If you like old school beat'em ups like 2 crude dudes and double dragon you'll love this.
just take streets of rage and add a little double dragon... add a lot of blood and some unique level and art designs and you will get the superb Bloody Zombies
